posts.post_content:
I have the following two T206s that I would like to trade:

Bell, Brooklyn (Pitching Follow Thru)
Dygert, Phila Amer.

[IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/5637/t2061.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/8928/t2062.jpg[/IMG]

I'd like to trade for other T206 cards in similar condition that I don't already have.  I'd like to do 1-to-1 but could go 2-for-1 for a nicer card or better-known player.
